matrix-project.description: Builds the Document Processing VDK samples sources on Linux.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: MAJOR_NUMBER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Major number for the Document Processing VDK

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: MINOR_NUMBER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Minor number for the Document Processing VDK

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SUBMINOR_NUMBER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This is ignored if the value is 0, otherwise the version number changes to MajorNum.MinorNum-Subminor.Buildnumber

scm.projectOptions: allwrite clobber nocompress unlocked nomodtime rmdir

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
Retval=0 echo [INFO]AMDCOMPUTESDKROOT: ${AMDCOMPUTESDKROOT} echo [INFO]CLFFT_DIR: ${CLFFT_DIR}
OPENCL_ARCHIVE_x86=$(readlink -f OpenCL_*_${OSTYPE}_release_x86.${ARCHIVE_EXTENSION}) OPENCL_ARCHIVE_amd64=$(readlink -f OpenCL_*_${OSTYPE}_release_amd64.${ARCHIVE_EXTENSION}) echo [INFO]OPENCL_ARCHIVE_x86: $OPENCL_ARCHIVE_x86 echo [INFO]OPENCL_ARCHIVE_amd64: $OPENCL_ARCHIVE_amd64
mkdir -pv "${AMDCOMPUTESDKROOT}" Retval=$? if [ $Retval -ne 0 ]; then echo [ERR]Could not create the directory ${AMDCOMPUTESDKROOT} exit $Retval fi
echo [INFO]Calling tar -jxvf "${OPENCL_ARCHIVE_x86}" --exclude=etc --exclude=include/acl --exclude=include/opencl1.2 --exclude=lib/x86/*.bc --exclude=lib/x86/plugin*.so --exclude=lib/x86/libcltrace.so --exclude=bin -C ${AMDCOMPUTESDKROOT} tar -jxvf "${OPENCL_ARCHIVE_x86}" --exclude=etc --exclude=include/acl --exclude=include/opencl1.2 --exclude=lib/x86/*.bc --exclude=lib/x86/plugin*.so --exclude=lib/x86/libcltrace.so --exclude=bin -C ${AMDCOMPUTESDKROOT} if [ $Retval -ne 0 ]; then echo [ERR]Could not extract ${OPENCL_ARCHIVE_x86} to ${AMDCOMPUTESDKROOT} exit $Retval fi
pushd ${AMDCOMPUTESDKROOT} pushd include rm -vf *.h *.hpp Retval=$? if [ $Retval -ne 0 ]; then echo [ERR]Failed to remove the .h and .hpp files from the directory $(pwd) popd exit $Retval fi mv -vf opencl2.0/CL ./ Retval=$? if [ $Retval -ne 0 ]; then echo [ERR]Failed to move the $(pwd)/opencl2.0/CL to $(pwd) popd exit $Retval fi rm -rvf opencl2.0 Retval=$? if [ $Retval -ne 0 ]; then echo [ERR]Failed to remove the directory $(pwd)/opencl2.0 popd exit $Retval fi popd
tar -jxvf "${OPENCL_ARCHIVE_x86}" ./bin/x86/clinfo Retval=$? if [ $Retval -ne 0 ]; then echo [ERR]Could not extract bin/x86/clinfo from ${OPENCL_ARCHIVE_x86} to $(pwd) exit $Retval fi tar -jxvf "${OPENCL_ARCHIVE_amd64}" ./bin/x86_64/clinfo Retval=$? if [ $Retval -ne 0 ]; then echo [ERR]Could not extract bin/x86_64/clinfo from ${OPENCL_ARCHIVE_amd64} to $(pwd) exit $Retval fi
tar -jxvf "${OPENCL_ARCHIVE_amd64}" ./lib/x86_64/libOpenCL* ./lib/x86_64/libamd*.so Retval=$? if [ $Retval -ne 0 ]; then echo [ERR]Could not extract ./lib/x86_64/libOpenCL* ./lib/x86_64/libamd*.so from ${OPENCL_ARCHIVE_amd64} to $(pwd) fi popd
exit $Retval

#!/bin/bash #Copyright (c) 2014 Advanced Micro Devices, Inc. All rights reserved. #This script replaces the Version Number in the Samples header files #based on the MasterSampleVersion.csv
echo [INFO]MAJOR_NUMBER: $MAJOR_NUMBER echo [INFO]MINOR_NUMBER: $MINOR_NUMBER echo [INFO]SUBMINOR_NUMBER: $SUBMINOR_NUMBER echo [INFO]SAMPLE: $S
#Check for the presence of MasterSampleVersion.csv, if not found, then exit Master=$WORKSPACE/samples/MasterSampleVersion.csv if [[ ! "$Master" ]]; then echo [ERR]File: $Master not found exit 1 fi
#The MasterSampleVersion.csv file contains file names with Windows style back-slash as file delimiters, replace them with the Unix style forward slash echo [INFO]Calling sed -i 's/\\/\//g' "$Master" sed -i 's/\\/\//g' "$Master" RetVal=$? if [[ $RetVal -ne 0 ]]; then echo [ERR]Could not replace Windows backslashes to Unix forward slashes in $WORKSPACE. exit $RetVal fi
#The file name in MasterSampleVersion.csv file contains full file path of files from a Perforce repo. The repo path needs to be replaced with the workspace where the file is checked out by Peforce. echo [INFO]Calling sed -i "s?\/\/depot\/stg\/app_sdk?$WORKSPACE?g" "$Master" sed -i "s?\/\/depot\/stg\/app_sdk?$WORKSPACE?g" "$Master" RetVal=$? if [[ $RetVal -ne 0 ]]; then echo [ERR]Could not replace //depot/stg/app_sdk with $WORKSPACE fi
#File $Master exists, proceeding with parsing it and updating OLDIFS=$IFS IFS="," while read -r SampleName SampleVersion SampleSourceFile SampleCategory do if [ -e "$SampleSourceFile" ]; then echo [INFO]Replacing AMD-COMPUTE-SDK-vx.y.z.s with AMD-${VDK_NAME}-VDK-v$PRODUCTVERSION.$SampleVersion in file: $SampleSourceFile sed -i.bak "s?AMD-COMPUTE-SDK-vx.y.z.s?AMD-${VDK_NAME}-VDK-v$PRODUCTVERSION.$SampleVersion?g" "$SampleSourceFile" if [[ $? -ne 0 ]]; then echo [ERR]Could not replace AMD-COMPUTE-SDK-vx.y.z.s with AMD-${VDK_NAME}-VDK-v$PRODUCTVERSION.${SampleVersion} in file: $SampleSourceFile fi fi done < $Master IFS=$OLDIFS

#!/bin/bash # This shell script compiles the APP SDK Sample Sources except the APARAPI ones and creates appropriate archives at the end
OPENCV_VERSION=0 NUMBER_OF_PROCESSORS=$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN) PARALLEL_COMPILATIONS=$(($NUMBER_OF_PROCESSORS*2)) export PATH=/opt/${T}/bin:$PATH
LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/opt/${T}/dependent-libs:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH if [ $P = "x86" ]; then export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/opt/${T}/lib:${LD_LIBRARY_PATH} fi
if [ $P = "amd64" ]; then export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/opt/${T}/lib64:${LD_LIBRARY_PATH} fi
echo [INFO]Using gcc: $(which gcc) echo [INFO]LD_LIBRARY_PATH=${LD_LIBRARY_PATH} echo [INFO]PATH=${PATH}
echo [INFO]Copying include and LIBs to AMDCOMPUTESDKROOT echo [INFO]Sample: ${S} echo [INFO]Platform: ${P}
BUILD_APARAPI=OFF BUILD_BOLT=OFF BUILD_OPENCL=OFF BUILD_OPENCV=OFF Retval=
if [[ -n "$S" && $S = "Bolt" ]] then BUILD_BOLT=ON BOLT_ARCHIVE_NAME=Bolt-${BOLTLIB_VERSION}-`uname`-GCC-4.7.3 BOLT_ARCHIVE=$(readlink -f "Bolt/${BOLTLIB_VERSION}/${OSTYPE}/${BOLT_ARCHIVE_NAME}*.tar.gz") TBB_ARCHIVE_NAME=tbb${TBB_VERSION}oss TBB_ARCHIVE=$(readlink -f "TBB/${TBB_VERSION}/${OSTYPE}/${TBB_ARCHIVE_NAME}_lin.tgz")
export BOLTLIB_DIR=$WORKSPACE/$BOLT_ARCHIVE_NAME export TBB_ROOT=$WORKSPACE/$TBB_ARCHIVE_NAME/
if ! tar -zxvf $BOLT_ARCHIVE $BOLT_ARCHIVE_NAME/include ; then exit $? fi if ! tar -zxvf $TBB_ARCHIVE $TBB_ARCHIVE_NAME/include ; then exit $? fi
if ! tar -zxvf ${BOLT_ARCHIVE} "${BOLT_ARCHIVE_NAME}/${BOLT_LIBDIR_NAME}" ; then exit $? fi if ! tar -zxvf ${TBB_ARCHIVE} ${TBB_ARCHIVE_NAME}/lib/${PLATFORM_ARCH_INTEL} ; then exit $? fi fi
if [[ -n "$S" && $S = "OpenCL" ]] then BUILD_OPENCL=ON fi
if [[ -n "$S" && $S = "OpenCV" ]] then BUILD_OPENCV=ON #$WORKSPACE/fromMatrix/label=slaveA/dist/mybuild.jar OPENCV_SRC_FILEFULL=$(readlink -f "${WORKSPACE}/L=LBM,P=${PLATFORM_ARCH_AMD}/opencv-*-${OSTYPE}-${PLATFORM_ARCH_AMD}.${ARCHIVE_EXTENSION}") OPENCV_BUILD_VERSION=$(echo $OPENCV_SRC_FILEFULL | awk -F'-' '{print $2}') OPENCV_MAJOR_NUMBER=$(echo $OPENCV_BUILD_VERSION | awk -F'.' '{print $1}') OPENCV_MINOR_NUMBER=$(echo $OPENCV_BUILD_VERSION | awk -F'.' '{print $2}') OPENCV_SUBMINOR_NUMBER=$(echo $OPENCV_BUILD_VERSION | awk -F'.' '{print $3}') OPENCV_BUILD_NUMBER=$(echo $OPENCV_BUILD_VERSION | awk -F'.' '{print $4}') OPENCV_VERSION=${OPENCV_MAJOR_NUMBER}.${OPENCV_MINOR_NUMBER}.${OPENCV_SUBMINOR_NUMBER} OCVCL_VER=${OPENCV_MAJOR_NUMBER}${OPENCV_MINOR_NUMBER}${OPENCV_SUBMINOR_NUMBER}
echo [INFO]OPENCV_SRC_FILEFULL: $OPENCV_SRC_FILEFULL echo [INFO]OPENCV_BUILD_VERSION: $OPENCV_BUILD_VERSION echo [INFO]OPENCV_MAJOR_NUMBER: $OPENCV_MAJOR_NUMBER echo [INFO]OPENCV_MINOR_NUMBER: $OPENCV_MINOR_NUMBER echo [INFO]OPENCV_SUBMINOR_NUMBER: $OPENCV_SUBMINOR_NUMBER echo [INFO]OPENCV_BUILD_NUMBER: $OPENCV_BUILD_NUMBER echo [INFO]OPENCV_VERSION: $OPENCV_VERSION echo [INFO]OCVCL_VER: $OCVCL_VER
OPENNI_ARCHIVE_NAME=OpenNI-`uname`-$PLATFORM_ARCH_SHORT-$OPENNI_VERSION OPENNI_ARCHIVE=$WORKSPACE/OpenNI/$OPENNI_VERSION/$OSTYPE/$OPENNI_ARCHIVE_NAME.$ARCHIVE_EXTENSION
OPENCV_ARCHIVE_NAME=opencv-$OPENCV_BUILD_VERSION-$OSTYPE-$PLATFORM_ARCH_AMD OPENCV_ARCHIVE=$(readlink -f "${WORKSPACE}/L=LBM,P=${PLATFORM_ARCH_AMD}/opencv-*-${OSTYPE}-${PLATFORM_ARCH_AMD}.${ARCHIVE_EXTENSION}")
if [[ -n "$x86" && $x86 = "true" ]] then
echo [INFO]Executing tar -jxvf $OPENNI_ARCHIVE */Redist */Include --exclude=*/Include/Android-Arm --exclude=*/Include/Linux-Arm --exclude=*/Include/MacOSX --exclude=*/Include/Driver --exclude=*/Include/Win32 if ! tar -jxvf $OPENNI_ARCHIVE */Redist */Include --exclude=*/Include/Android-Arm --exclude=*/Include/Linux-Arm --exclude=*/Include/MacOSX --exclude=*/Include/Driver --exclude=*/Include/Win32 ; then exit $? fi
export OPENNI2_LIB=$WORKSPACE/$OPENNI_ARCHIVE_NAME/Redist export OPENNI2_INCLUDE=$WORKSPACE/$OPENNI_ARCHIVE_NAME/Include fi
if [[ -n "$amd64" && $amd64 = "true" ]] then echo [INFO]Executing tar -jxvf $OPENNI_ARCHIVE --exclude=*/Include/Android-Arm --exclude=*/Include/Linux-Arm --exclude=*/Include/MacOSX --exclude=*/Include/Driver --exclude=*/Include/Win32 --exclude=*/Documentation --exclude=*/Samples --exclude=*/Tools if ! tar -jxvf $OPENNI_ARCHIVE --exclude=*/Include/Android-Arm --exclude=*/Include/Linux-Arm --exclude=*/Include/MacOSX --exclude=*/Include/Driver --exclude=*/Include/Win32 --exclude=*/Documentation --exclude=*/Samples --exclude=*/Tools ; then exit $? fi
export OPENNI2_LIB64=$WORKSPACE/$OPENNI_ARCHIVE_NAME/Redist export OPENNI2_INCLUDE64=$WORKSPACE/$OPENNI_ARCHIVE_NAME/Include fi
if ! tar -jxvf $OPENCV_ARCHIVE $OPENCV_ARCHIVE_NAME/lib $OPENCV_ARCHIVE_NAME/include ; then exit $? fi export OPENCV_DIR=$WORKSPACE/$OPENCV_ARCHIVE_NAME fi
echo [INFO]BUILD_APARAPI=$BUILD_APARAPI echo [INFO]BUILD_BOLT=$BUILD_BOLT echo [INFO]BUILD_OPENCL=$BUILD_OPENCL echo [INFO]BUILD_OPENCV=$BUILD_OPENCV echo [INFO]BOLTLIB_DIR=$BOLTLIB_DIR echo [INFO]TBB_ROOT=$TBB_ROOT echo [INFO]OPENNI2_LIB=$OPENNI2_LIB echo [INFO]OPENNI2_INCLUDE=$OPENNI2_INCLUDE echo [INFO]OPENNI2_LIB64=$OPENNI2_LIB64 echo [INFO]OPENNI2_INCLUDE64=$OPENNI2_INCLUDE64 echo [INFO]OPENCV_DIR=$OPENCV_DIR
echo ---------------- Building $ARCH-bit binaries --------------
CMAKE_OPTIONS="-DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=/opt/gcc473/bin/g++ -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=/opt/gcc473/bin/gcc" CMAKE_OPTIONS="-DBUILD_BOLT=$BUILD_BOLT -DBUILD_OPENCL=$BUILD_OPENCL -DBUILD_OPENCV=$BUILD_OPENCV -DBITNESS=$ARCH $CMAKE_OPTIONS" echo [INFO]Calling cmake with options: $CMAKE_OPTIONS cmake -G "Unix Makefiles" -DENABLE_TBB=OFF $CMAKE_OPTIONS samples Retval=$? if [[ $Retval -eq 0 ]] then make -j $PARALLEL_COMPILATIONS Retval=$? if [ $Retval -eq 0 ]; then if [[ $BUILD_BOLT = "ON" ]] then echo ----------------- Building Bolt TBB libraries ------------------- cmake -G "Unix Makefiles" -DENABLE_TBB=ON $CMAKE_OPTIONS samples Retval=$? if [[ $Retval -eq 0 ]] then make -j $PARALLEL_COMPILATIONS Retval=$? if [ $Retval -ne 0 ]; then echo [ERR]Bolt TBB failed to build. exit $Retval fi else echo [ERR]cmake for Bolt_TBB failed exit $Retval fi fi
#make succeeded, create archives ${a,,} DIR=samples/${S,,}/bin/$PLATFORM_ARCH_ALT mkdir -pv "$DIR" Retval=$? if [ $Retval -eq 0 ]; then
# This is needed since OpenCL directory has one more level of indirection SRCDIR=samples/${S,,}/*/bin/$PLATFORM_ARCH_ALT/Release if [ $S = "OpenCL" ]; then SRCDIR=samples/${S,,}/*/*/bin/$PLATFORM_ARCH_ALT/Release fi
echo [INFO]SRCDIR: $SRCDIR echo [INFO]DIR: $DIR
mv -vf $SRCDIR/* $DIR rm -rvf samples/${S,,}/*/*/bin
if [ $S = "OpenCL" ]; then #For the 1.x an 2.0 category samples SRCDIR=samples/${S,,}/*/*/*/bin/$PLATFORM_ARCH_ALT/Release mv -vf $SRCDIR/* $DIR rm -rvf samples/${S,,}/*/*/*/bin fi
ARCHIVE_NAME=${WORKSPACE}/${VDK_NAME}_VDK-${OSTYPE}-build-${S}-${ARTIFACT_PRODUCTVERSION}-${T}-${P}.${ARCHIVE_EXTENSION}
if [ -d include/SDKUtil ]; then SDKUtil_INCLUDE=include/SDKUtil fi tar -jcvf $ARCHIVE_NAME samples $SDKUtil_INCLUDE thirdParty --exclude=samples/opencl/cl/OpenCLService --exclude=samples/opencl/cl/SimpleDX9 --exclude=samples/opencl/cl/SimpleDX10 --exclude=samples/opencl/cl/SimpleDX11 --exclude=samples/C++Amp --exclude=samples/bolt/BlackScholesAMP --exclude=samples/bolt/BoltAMPIntro --exclude=samples/MasterSampleVersion.csv --exclude=samples/*/*/*.vcxproj --exclude=samples/*/*.sln --exclude=samples/*.bat --exclude=samples/*/*/*.bak --exclude=samples/*/*/*/*.bak --exclude=samples/aparapi/examples/*/*.bat --exclude=samples/aparapi/*.bat
if [ $S = "OpenCL" ]; then LIB_ARCHIVE=$WORKSPACE/${VDK_NAME}_VDK-${OSTYPE}-AMDCOMPUTESDKROOT-$ARTIFACT_PRODUCTVERSION-noarch.${ARCHIVE_EXTENSION} pushd AMDCOMPUTESDKROOT tar -jcvf $LIB_ARCHIVE * RetVal=$? popd fi else echo [ERR]Could not create directory: $DIR fi else echo --------- [ERR]Failed to build $ARCH-bit binaries--------- fi else echo ---------[ERR]Could not generator make files for $ARCH-bit binaries fi
exit $Retval

hudson.plugins.emailext.ExtendedEmailPub.defaultSubject: CAS Build System: ${VDK_NAME_FULL} VDK Linux Build: $BUILD_STATUS!
hudson.plugins.emailext.ExtendedEmailPub.defaultContent:
CAS Build System  |  Update preferences  |  Unsubscribe

${VDK_NAME_FULL} Linux Build Notification

STATUS

The CAS Build System finished building the $PROJECT_NAME

Status: $BUILD_STATUS
BuildNumber: $ARTIFACT_PRODUCTVERSION
Originator: $CAUSE
Changes: $CHANGES
Download URL: ${JOB_URL}${BUILD_NUMBER}
Build Console: ${BUILD_URL}console

AMD | AMD Central
